name: Overworked & Underpaid
description:
As we all know, death is inevitable. But so is getting fired if you are bad at your job, so what do you do when both are at stake? As the last doctor in a busy hospital, patients are constantly being delivered with no care of your workload.

Move around with WASD and use E to interact. Grab the correct treatment for each patients illness, and keep them alive long enough for them to be considered cured!
